channel.id as channel_id, channel.name as channel_name, channel.status as channel_status, channel.decription as channel_decription, channel.type as channel_type, channel.en_name as channel_en_name, channel.created_time as channel_created_time, channel.update_time as channel_update_time, channel.created_by as channel_created_by, channel.update_by as channel_update_by, channel.parent_id as channel_parent_id, channel.title as channel_title, channel.user_id as channel_user_id, channel.url as channel_url, channel.icon as channel_icon, channel.path as channel_path

attachment.id as attachment_id , attachment.name as attachment_name, attachment.status as attachment_status, attachment.decription as attachment_decription, attachment.type as attachment_type, attachment.en_name as attachment_en_name, attachment.created_time as attachment_created_time, attachment.update_time as attachment_update_time, attachment.created_by as attachment_created_by, attachment.update_by as attachment_update_by, attachment.url as attachment_url, attachment.icon as attachment_icon, attachment.path as attachment_path, attachment.article_id as attachment_article_id
mapper.select:
select
,
,
,
from article left join channel on article.channel_id = channel.id left join attachment on attachment.article_id = article.id where article.id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
